ygData.subject: Re: EQ Update
ygData.msgSnippet: Settle onto Brell and damned and determined to get my Druid to 50.  She should hit 34 today!  Joined a great guild, Mithril Empire, and am having a blast with
ygData.messageBody:
Settle onto Brell and damned and determined to get my Druid to 50. She
should hit 34 today! Joined a great guild, Mithril Empire, and am
having a blast with what I hope becomes a new in-game romance (just
starting, but he DID kiss me). I've been at odds since my partner of 4
mos. left EQ entirely and had a bad spate with my DE necromancer. I
think I'm going to kill her and take all her good int stuff and twink a
newbie enchantress with it someday.

My primary alt at the moment is a young Bard who I'm having fun making
lambent armor for (though the wood elf helm looks like a bright blue
bucket with ears). She has a twin brother cleric who has to work hard
to keep her in line because she's basically a brat <giggles>. I'm
loving bard though and it may be the next class I commit to. I have
played all classes now except monk, enchanter, and rogue. No desire for
monk and rogue, actually.

The best part of hitting the 30s is that it's as high as I've ever been
so I'm getting to explore new areas. Note: do not attempt Kedge Keep
using enduring breath until you don't have to look at your book to
meditate. Boy we drown FAST! My favorite prey at the moment are
giants. I can't solo them but with a small group when the zones aren't
crowded, they are a blast. I joke about breaking their toes with my
tiny hammer making it harder for them to run because I do insignifant
damage compred to my high 30s groupmates. Still, something about
killing that Sand Giant that ate you for breakfast every morning in the
oasis is SOOOOO satisfying.

Iceiallana Forestfury
Druid of the 33rd circle
Brell Serilis

Christina Norman wrote:

> From: Christina Norman <tina@...>
>
>
> This list has grown pretty quiet, and that's ok. I thought I'd send
> an
> innocent 'hi' to the list though and see what everyone has been up to
> in
> EQ lately?
>
> I recently became an apprentice guide and I've been having a lot of
> fun
> with that. We're not supposed to tell people what server we're on
> unfortunately, so I can't tell you that =/
>
> My Ranger on Brell made 50 recently (I also have a 50 enchanter
> there).
> I've been spending a lot of time killing dragons, and romping though
> the
> planes. In a way I miss the simpler dungeons, since plane and dragon
> raids are usually always lengthy undertakings, and 90% of the time you
>
> just sit around waiting for the next fight to happen.
>
> I started a baby magician on Luclin mostly to visit a close friend who
> has
> moved there. It's nice to have a pet =) They're fun.
>
> - Tina
>
> -----------------------------------------------------------------------
>
> -----------------------------------------------------------------------
>
